title: HOUR 3- Brian Scalabrine Sep 02, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Brian Scalabrine Sep 02, 2020
description:
Brian Scalabrine says he is surprised that the Celtics are up on the Raptors 2 games to none. Brian says that he thought the Raptors players would out play the Celtics. Brian tells Dan that back when he played; once his Celtics got Kevin Garnett that was when there became a rival between Paul Pierce and LeBron James.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Brian Scalabrine says he is surprised that the Celtics are up on the Raptors 2 games to none. Brian says that he thought the Raptors players would out play the Celtics. Brian tells Dan that back when he played; once his Celtics got Kevin Garnett that was when there became a rival between Paul Pierce and LeBron James.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
